item.title: Orca announces the launch of the Wavebreak Token Issuance Platform
item.description: On July 30th, the Solana liquidity protocol Orca declared the launch of the token issuance platform Wavebreak. It integrates CAPTCHA with the on-chain permission structure to safeguard against bots and front-running attacks on real users.Wavebreak provides proprietary anti-bot technology, permissionless token creation, a pre-launch token scorecard program, creator launch LP rewards, and daily rewards.

item.title: BTCS is planning to raise $2 billion to continue accumulating ETH.
item.description: On July 30th, as per Cointelegraph, the publicly traded company BTCS Inc. (BTCS) is going to raise up to $200 million through a preferred stock warrant offering in order to enhance its treasury by obtaining more ETH.

item.title: AXIOS: White House is actively lobbying against a presidential stock trading ban
item.description: July 30th. As per AXIOS, the bill proposed by Republican Senator Josh Hawley to prohibit stock trading by members of Congress is emerging as a significant challenge within the Republican Party. Several sources disclosed that owing to opposition from Homeland Security Committee Chair Rand Paul, Hawley requires Democratic support in order to get the vote scheduled for Wednesday passed. Consequently, Hawley has consented to incorporate language that would also forbid the President and Vice President, thereby expanding the scope of the ban beyond just members of Congress. Insiders indicated that the White House Legislative Affairs Office has launched a counteroffensive upon becoming aware of this and has been lobbying against the proposed stock trading ban.

item.title: The White House Delays CFTC Chairman Nomination Vote Possibly Due to Quintenz Previously Seeking Access to Competitors' Cellphone Data
item.description: On July 30th, according to crypto reporter Eleanor Terrett, the White House has postponed advancing the vote on the CFTC Chairman nomination. This might be because nominee Quintenz's team was seeking to obtain CFTC confidential information related to competitors like Polymarket and PredictIt while he was still serving as a director at Kalshi. The potential conflict of interest issue has drawn attention.

item.title: ZachXBT Investigation Leads to Conviction and Restitution Order for Cameron Redman
item.description: On July 30th, on-chain detective ZachXBT stated that Canadian Cameron Redman was convicted due to his investigations and was ordered to make restitution. In June 2022, Redman made a profit of 250 ETH by selling access to the X platform dashboard, which led to the theft of more than 10 prominent accounts (including JRNY, Beeple, Nouns, Zeneca, DeeKay, etc.), and millions of dollars in assets were stolen through a phishing scam. Redman was previously known for stealing $37 million in a 2020 SIM card swap attack.

item.title: Data: Multiple entities have accumulated as much as 648,000 ETH since July 10, with a total value of approximately $2.44 billion
item.description: On July 30th, as per EmberCN's monitoring, the address "0x3dF...E3E" continued to accumulate 12,000 ETH through Galaxy Digital 7 hours ago, which is worth $45.01 million. This address has accumulated a total of 112,972 ETH in eleven days starting from July 19th, with a value of $4.13 billion and an average price of $3,662.Since July 10th, addresses that have been accumulating a large amount of ETH through multiple channels (not belonging to the same entity) have now accumulated as much as 648,000 ETH, approximately worth $24.4 billion, and have a weighted average price of around $3,445.

item.title: CITIC Securities: Focus on Potential Recipients of the First Batch of Hong Kong Stablecoin Licenses
item.description: July 30th. On July 29th, the research report of Citic Securities stated that the Hong Kong Monetary Authority issued a series of documents regarding the regulatory framework for stablecoin issuers, which is set to come into effect on August 1st. The core document is the "Licensed Stablecoin Issuer Regulatory Guidance," and the most significant guidance document during the current application phase is the "Stablecoin Issuer Licensing Regime Summary Description." Regarding the timeline, the Monetary Authority encourages prospective applicants to get in touch with regulators by August 31st, and mature applicants have until September 30th to submit applications. It is initially expected that the number of licenses will be in the single digits, and there is a potential for them to be launched by the end of the year. It is recommended to continuously monitor stablecoin issuers who may obtain the first batch of scarce licenses and scenario platforms that are actively involved in creating stab

item.title: AI Agent Platform Delve Raises $32 Million in Funding, Led by Insight Partners
item.description: On July 30th, Al Agent, a security and compliance platform established by two 21-year-old MIT dropouts named Karun Kaushik and Selin Kocalar, declared a $32 million funding round with a valuation of $300 million. This funding was spearheaded by Insight Partners and saw the participation of several Fortune 500 CISOs.

item.title: OpenAI has announced the launch of ChatGPT Study Mode, offering a guided learning experience.
item.description: July 30: OpenAI made an announcement regarding the launch of ChatGPT Study Mode. This mode is designed to offer a step-by-step, guided learning experience, with a primary focus on the education sector. It provides interactive prompts, scaffolded responses, and personalized education. ChatGPT Study serves as a 24/7 online tutoring service, capable of delivering personalized guidance and feedback according to students' learning pace and requirements.

item.title: Linea Announces Tokenomics: Total Supply of approximately 72 billion tokens, with 9% Allocated for Early User Airdrop
item.description: On July 30th, Linea officially made an announcement about the LINEA Tokenomics. The total supply of tokens is 72,009,990,000 (approximately 72 billion), which is equivalent to 1,000 times the initial circulating supply of ETH. The distribution is designed to have a certain echo with Ethereum's genesis distribution: 85% of the supply is dedicated to the ecosystem, and the remaining 15% is allocated to the Consensys Treasury. Early users will receive tokens from a distribution that is equivalent to 9% of the token supply, and these tokens will be airdropped at the Time of Genesis Event (TGE) and will be fully unlocked. The eligibility for the airdrop will be assessed based on a series of metrics, including LXP and on-chain indicators. The full details and individual qualification information will be announced through the official qualification checker prior to the TGE. In addition to the user airdrop, 1% of the LINEA token supply will be reserved for strategic builders in the Linea ecosy
